name: Project Hoversword
description:
This is a prototype for an action adventure game where you delve into old alien ruins on a planet with intense magnetic currents to become a hoverswording legend. 

To get through this short-ish (5-30 min depending on skill) section of obstacles, tunnels and some desert you will need to master the tight controls as well as slash up some batteries.

You die by losing all HP or by driving into something head first.

You lose HP by boarding through laser walls or by Boosting.

There's no actual end to this prototype yet, you will know when you've made it through.

Using a gamepad is recommended but keyboard controls are:

W/SAccelerate/BreakA/DSteerQ/E or Left/Right arrowsPitch (lean forward/backward)MouseCameraBBoostLeft ShiftDriftVAttackLeft CTRLBlade Mode

The game was created as part of a university assignment and while we are passionate about the project and some of the team (including me) are definitely interested in developing it further, we all have to continue with our studies and it is likely that this game won't see any development beyond this point.
